spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is highly accurate. However, there is a labeling error in Bed-2 (mislabeled as Bed-1 in the render). Proportions and wall alignment are well-preserved, though the utility room wall thickness appears slightly exaggerated compared to the 2D plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Major violation of the no-text constraint; all measurement labels and room names from the 2D plan were hallucinated into the 3D geometry floor surface. Model successfully removed the roof and displays a floating state on a dark background.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is excellent, including small details like the deck seating and kitchen stove. Scales are consistent with the architectural layout.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Failure to follow style constraints: The render uses realistic textures (wood grain, marble, fabric rugs) and soft ray-traced shadows instead of the requested low-poly flat-colored aesthetic. Isometric perspective is correctly applied.

detected_errors.description: Strict violation: Text labels and measurements from the source image are rendered directly onto the 3D floor surface.
Style violation: The image uses photorealistic textures and complex materials instead of the requested low-poly, flat-color, no-texture style.
Room label distortion: The room on the left is incorrectly labeled 'BED-1' in the 3D view while the plan designates it 'BED-2'.
